text: - We provide frictionless healthcare
by using proprietary AI software

to help increase collaboration
between payer and providers.
We're an AWS shop,
and we implemented Trend
to sit on top of our AWS environment

so that we can detect any
anomalies and react accordingly

a lot faster than we would
if we had to go through
five or six different tools.

So with Trend Micro Vision
One, we're able to see issues

as they appear and
address them accordingly.
And that actually improves efficiency

and allows our devs a
safer space to develop
and clients to house their data.

With Trend ASRM, they have
their cloud posture tool,

which shows misconfigurations
and security issues
inside of our cloud environment.

And with that we are able
to pinpoint any issues
even before they get to production
so we're not exposing sensitive data.
So we started implementing Security Lake

'cause we wanted to consolidate
all of our security data,

and, you know, part of that's
pulling trend data in there
so we can have a single pane of glass

and all of that sits on
AWS's infrastructure.

And with that we're able
to gain more visibility,

and all of this is being
fed into OpenSearch.
When we implemented a lot of these tools,

we were able to see a
roughly 40% reduction
in overall vulnerabilities

in our microservice
architecture, which is fantastic.

It's also allowed us to
detect and take action against

any sort of threats we see
within our environment.
(upbeat music)
